Department of Earth Sciences: Monday Lecture Series. Lectures
are held on Mondays at 4.30 during termtime. They take place in the
Earth Sciences lecture theatre and are preceeded by tea and
biscuits. Speakers cover the entire breadth of the Earth Sciences.
Friday Seminars in Physical Earth Sciences. Physical Earth
Science seminars cover a wide range of subjects in which the
quantitative methods of the physical sciences, both theoretical and
experimental, are applied to earth science problems.  Fridays at 4.30
p.m. in the Earth Sciences upper coffee room.
